pages.text: This is a test entry, but it should show up!

pages.title: Amplifying Tube
pages.text: This item, when stacked two or higher, with view of the sun, will convert blocks beneath it into other blocks.

pages.title: Crushing Block
pages.text: This item, when placed in the world, falls like sand, and will crush entities beneath it into various dusts.

pages.title: Gravity Block
pages.text: This item affects entities in an area, drawing them near. A powered version responds to redstone.

pages.title: Dust Picking
pages.text: The picking table allows you to create shards on demand, rather than randomly via crushing crystals. Requires mysterious dust.

pages.title: Dust Picking
pages.text: Picking wands determine which shard is picked.

pages.title: Dust Picking
pages.text: There's a rack to store your wands. Shift-Right-Clicking stores wands, Right clicking cycles through stored wands.

pages.title: Collecting Light
pages.text: This block collects daylight, and needs a clear view of the sky. When broken, it can drop glowstone and Imprisoned Light
